info.title: AI Competition Platform API
info.description:
The API documentation for the various methods that are available for querying data, setting properties or accessing info from an agent.
Queries are cached and therefore do not update in real-time, but should always provide recent data.

port.description: The port on which the API is run.

tags.name: Student Methods
tags.description: Methods that are available to be run by Students for information and bots.

tags.name: Agent Methods
tags.description: Methods that are available to use for agents.

tags.name: Admin Methods
tags.description: Admin utilities to assist in running the server.

get.description: Returns all agent IDs and their corresponding owner's display name.
Returns all agent IDs that belong to bots and their corresponding display name.
Returns all games ever played (paginated groups of 100).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of game history to request.

timePlayed.description: The time the game was played.

gameState.description: The game's log as a gzip compressed JSON. Look into 'gunzip'.

additionalProperties.description: Map of agent IDs to scores.

get.description: Returns the number of pages of games that can be requested.

get.summary: Get a Game by it's ID
get.description: Returns the game with the specified ID.

parameters.name: gameId
parameters.description: The game ID to search for.

timePlayed.description: The time the game was played.

gameState.description: The game's log as a gzip compressed JSON. Look into 'gunzip'.

additionalProperties.description: Map of agent IDs to scores.

get.summary: Get all Games played by an Agent
get.description: Returns the game where the specified Agent played in.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The agent ID to search for.

timePlayed.description: The time the game was played.

gameState.description: The game's log as a gzip compressed JSON. Look into 'gunzip'.

additionalProperties.description: Map of agent IDs to scores.

post.description: Given a student number and a new name, the display name of the student number's agent is set.

parameters.name: studentNumber
parameters.description: A valid user token.

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: The new display name to be set.

get.summary: Get the Agents with the Top Win-Rates
get.description: Returns an array of data corresponding to the top agents.

isBot.description: If the agent is a bot.

gamesPlayed.description: How many games the agent has played.

wins.description: How many games the agent has won.

get.summary: Get the Win-rate of a specific Agent
get.description: Returns data relevant to the provided agent name.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The display name of the agent to query.

initialWinPercent.description: The original win-percentage of the agent.

lastWinPercent.description: The win-percentage of the agent as of it's last game.

percentageImproved.description: The percentage improvement of the agent.

get.description: Returns an array of data corresponding to the most improved agents.

initialWinPercent.description: The original win-percentage of the agent.

lastWinPercent.description: The win-percentage of the agent as of it's last game.

percentageImproved.description: The percentage improvement of the agent.

get.summary: Get the Improvement of a specific Agent
get.description: Returns data relevant to the provided agent name.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The display name of the agent to query.

initialWinPercent.description: The original win-percentage of the agent.

lastWinPercent.description: The win-percentage of the agent as of it's last game.

percentageImproved.description: The percentage improvement of the agent.

get.description: Returns a list of available games.

post.description: Returns a list of available games.

parameters.name: agentToken
parameters.description: The student token to verify.

get.description: Returns a success if the provided token is an admin token.

parameters.name: adminToken
parameters.description: The admin token to verify.

authenticated.description: If the token is valid or not.

get.summary: Get a list of all Users
get.description: Returns a list of all users, showing their student number, display name and token.

parameters.name: adminToken
parameters.description: Admin token required.

studentNumber.description: The student number of this user.

displayName.description: The display name of this user.

authToken.description: The authentication token of this user.

post.description: Creates a new student token, given a seed input and authorization.

parameters.name: adminToken
parameters.description: Admin token required.

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: The seed to generate the token.

post.description: Creates a new student token, given a seed input and authorization.

parameters.name: adminToken
parameters.description: Admin token required.

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: The seed to generate the token.

get.summary: Returns if the Game has Started
get.description: Returns a boolean indicating if the game has begun for an agent.

parameters.name: agentToken
parameters.description: The token belonging to the agent who is checking.

get.summary: Returns if the Game has Finished
get.description: Returns a boolean indicating if the game has ended for an agent.

parameters.name: agentToken
parameters.description: The token belonging to the agent who is checking.

get.summary: Returns if it is an Agent's Turn
get.description: Returns a boolean indicating if it is an agent's turn in a game.

parameters.name: agentToken
parameters.description: The token belonging to the agent who is checking.

200.description: If it is the agent's turn.

isTurn.description: If it is the agent's turn.

get.summary: Returns the state for an Agent
get.description: Returns the state object for a specific player..

parameters.name: agentToken
parameters.description: The token belonging to the agent who is requesting.

state.description: The game state. The schema for this depends on the game.

post.summary: Returns the state for an Agent
post.description: Returns the state object for a specific player.

parameters.name: agentToken
parameters.description: The token belonging to the agent who is requesting.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The action to play when it is the agent's turn.

schema.description: The action. The schema for this depends on the game being played.

get.summary: Run a Method on a Game Object
get.description: Returns the result of a method run on the game object.

parameters.name: agentToken
parameters.description: The token belonging to the agent who is requesting.

parameters.name: keys
parameters.description: The sequence of keys to access in the game object.

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: The method to call at the end of keys.

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: The arguments of the method being called.

schema.description: The supplied arguments depend on the method being called.

result.description: The result of the method. The schema for this depends on the game.

post.description: Joins a lobby with the provided options. If a lobbyID is specified and it doesn't exist, a lobby will be joined with the provided options.

parameters.name: agentToken
parameters.description: The token belonging to the agent who is joining.

parameters.name: gameID
parameters.description: The ID of the game that is to be played.

parameters.name: lobbyID
parameters.description: The ID of the lobby that is to be joined/created if it doesn't exist.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: The options to be supplied to the lobby if it is being created.

bots.description: The number of bots to be added to the game.

slots.description: The number of players to start the game.

password.description: The password to join the lobby specified.

success.description: If the lobby was joined/created successfully.
